description: EcoCentral is an initiative that connects organic food producers with school canteens in Catalonia, promoting sustainable and healthy eating. Founded by a former chef, the organization emphasizes transparency in pricing and fosters direct relationships between producers and canteens. By organizing workshops and planning sessions, EcoCentral ensures that schools receive quality organic products while supporting local farmers. Their model prioritizes fair pricing and aims to enhance children's connection to food origins.
name: EcoCentral
